alert.note: Alert for Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:11PM EST until January 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches with localized higher amounts possible near Tupper Lake. * WHERE...Southern Franklin County and southwestern St. Lawrence County in New York. * WHEN...Through 1 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall rates are expected this afternoon into early this evening. The lake effect snow band will shift south of the area after 1 AM, but some light additional snow showers Thursday are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
